text: "We Don't Need Another Hero (Thunderdome)" is a 1985 song by Tina Turner and from the 1985 movie Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome. It was nominated for a Grammy Award. It topped the charts in Australia, Canada, Germany, Poland, Spain and Switzerland and went to number 2 in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Ireland, Italy, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal and the United States. The music video features future England rugby player Lawrence Dallaglio. title: We Don't Need Another Hero (Thunderdome)
